libcbor  0.3.1
libcbor is a C library for parsing and generating CBOR, the general-purpose schema-less binary data format.
  • Main Page
  • Data Structures

22 #define CBOR_MAJOR_VERSION 0
23 #define CBOR_MINOR_VERSION 3
24 #define CBOR_PATCH_VERSION 1
25 
26 static const uint8_t cbor_major_version = CBOR_MAJOR_VERSION;
27 static const uint8_t cbor_minor_version = CBOR_MINOR_VERSION;
28 static const uint8_t cbor_patch_version = CBOR_PATCH_VERSION;
29 
30 #define CBOR_VERSION TO_STR(CBOR_MAJOR_VERSION) "." TO_STR(CBOR_MINOR_VERSION) "." TO_STR(CBOR_PATCH_VERSION)
31 
32 #define CBOR_HEX_VERSION ((CBOR_MAJOR_VERSION << 16) | (CBOR_MINOR_VERSION << 8) | CBOR_PATCH_VERSION)
33 
34 /* http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1644868/c-define-macro-for-debug-printing */
35 #ifdef DEBUG
36 #include <stdio.h>
37 #define debug_print(fmt, ...) do { \
38  if (DEBUG) \
39  fprintf(stderr, "%s:%d:%s(): " fmt, __FILE__, __LINE__, __func__, __VA_ARGS__); \
40  } while (0)
41 #else
42 #define debug_print(fmt, ...) do {} while (0)
43 #endif

45 #define TO_STR_(x) #x
46 #define TO_STR(x) TO_STR_(x) /* enables proper double expansion */
